none: 香川県本山寺の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Motoyama Temple, Kagawa (Original)
香川県三豊市豊中町本山甲1445 ‎・1445 Motoyama Ko, Toyonaka-cho, Mitoyo City, Kagawa Prefecture
本田民部信行・Taminobu Honda Nobuyuki
本山寺様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。・We would like to thank Motoyamaji Temple for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.
算額は一般的に公開されていません。・The sangaku is generally not on public display.
